about_the_game:
Welcome to Pixel Hunt, a relaxing hidden object experimental game where you control unique cursors to find and fix simulated defective screen pixels right on your desktop. Perfect for unwinding or engaging in friendly competition, Pixel Hunt offers a unique twist on traditional hidden object gameplay.

Game Features

  • Relaxing Gameplay: Navigate your actual desktop with unique cursors to locate and repair simulated defective pixels in a soothing environment.
  • Diverse Game Modes: Enjoy multiple singleplayer modes, each offering unique challenges and objectives tailored for relaxation or skill testing.
  • Online Multiplayer: Compete with players worldwide in a friendly, stress-free environment, exploring their desktops or inviting them to play on yours.
  • Customization: Personalize your cursors with a variety of styles, trail effects, and click sounds.
  • Steam Workshop: Make and share your custom cursors and click sounds with other players using Steam Workshop.

Join hunters from around the world in Pixel Hunt. Start your pixel-hunting journey today and enjoy the tranquil satisfaction of finding and fixing every simulated defect right on your desktop. Happy hunting!

Welcome to Pixel Hunt, a relaxing hidden object experimental game where you control unique cursors to find and fix simulated defective screen pixels right on your desktop. Perfect for unwinding or engaging in friendly competition, Pixel Hunt offers a unique twist on traditional hidden object gameplay.

Game Features

  • Relaxing Gameplay: Navigate your actual desktop with unique cursors to locate and repair simulated defective pixels in a soothing environment.
  • Diverse Game Modes: Enjoy multiple singleplayer modes, each offering unique challenges and objectives tailored for relaxation or skill testing.
  • Online Multiplayer: Compete with players worldwide in a friendly, stress-free environment, exploring their desktops or inviting them to play on yours.
  • Customization: Personalize your cursors with a variety of styles, trail effects, and click sounds.
  • Steam Workshop: Make and share your custom cursors and click sounds with other players using Steam Workshop.

Join hunters from around the world in Pixel Hunt. Start your pixel-hunting journey today and enjoy the tranquil satisfaction of finding and fixing every simulated defect right on your desktop. Happy hunting!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (assumed, not tested)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11

short_description: Use unique cursors to find and fix simulated defective pixels on your desktop in this relaxing hidden object game. Enjoy multiple singleplayer modes and online multiplayer with friends, exploring others' desktops or inviting them to yours. Become a pixel hunter!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
